--- title: "Proyectos en OSF" output: html_document editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- Usar el API para consultar lista de proyectos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} here::i_am("rzrch/my-osfr-projects.qmd") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` here() starts at /Users/jferrer/proyectos/jrfep.github.io ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} file_name <- here::here("data","OSF-data.rds") lst_osf <- readRDS(file=file_name) getItem <- function(x) { sprintf("%1$s

Description: %2$s

", x$attributes$title, x$attributes$description, x$links$html) } ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat(unlist(lapply(lst_osf[[3]],getItem))) ``` Review and validation of predictions of Tropical Alpine regions

Description:

Spatial covariates for analysis of occurrence and abundance of vertebrate species in the Gran Sabana, Venezuela

Description: This repository contains instructions for downloading and preparing data for analysis. It also includes some data files related to field work.

Data for the RLE assessment of the T.G.E. Cordillera de Mérida

Description: Data for the Red List of Ecosystems assessment of the Tropical Glacier Ecosystem of the Cordillera de Mérida. This component contains data files to be used by the parent components of the project.

Environmental suitability model for Tropical Glacier Ecosystems

Description:

RLE assessment of the Tropical Glacier Ecosystem of the Cordillera de Mérida

Description: Red List of Ecosystems assessment of the Tropical Glacier Ecosystem of the Cordillera de Mérida. This is a global and national assessment for this ecosystem unit. The assessment unit is defined in a global context but its whole distribution is contained in one country (Venezuela). Thus, the assessment outcomes will inform both global and national RLE initiatives.

Resources selection model application for wildlife monitoring in Gran Sabana, Venezuela

Description: This repository includes analysis of resource selection by species, it uses a single visit occupancy model framework.

Data for the global RLE assessment of Tropical Glacier Ecosystems

Description: Data for the global Red List of Ecosystems assessment of all Tropical Glacier Ecosystems. This component contains data files to be used by other components of the project.

Suitability of Tropical Alpine Ecosystems using Machine Learning

Description:

Code for managing the fireveg database

Description: Python and R scripts for data input and curation

Data coverage of Fire Ecology Traits for Plants database
